description.value:
North america cargo rail cars
- Bulkheaded flatcar lumber - Coal hopper - Iron ore oopper - Iron flat
Technical Details: - Capacity: 26 lumber - Capacity: 25 coal - Capacity: 25 iron ore - Capacity: 10 iron - Availability: 3th era + depot extension
Price: - Lumber: 20 iron tokens - Hoppers: 20 iron tokens - Flat: 20 iron tokens
Features: - knuckle couplers
